scenes.text: Mir reaches the top of the tower, entering a vast chamber where the air crackles with magical energy. At the center stands the final boss, an ancient mummy lord, wielding the holy underwear taken from a defeated skeleton.

choices.text: Challenge the mummy lord to a duel.
Try to negotiate with the mummy lord.
Look for a way to steal the holy underwear.

scenes.text: The mummy lord laughs and brandishes the holy underwear, glowing with a divine light. The battle begins!

choices.text: Attack with the shield.
Strike with the nunchaku.
Use the magical sword.

scenes.text: Mir tries to negotiate, but the mummy lord is too enraged to listen. It attacks with the holy underwear's power!

choices.text: Defend with the shield.
Counterattack with the nunchaku.

scenes.text: Mir attempts to sneak around the mummy lord, but it senses the movement and unleashes a powerful blast from the holy underwear.

choices.text: Dodge and counter with the shield.
Dodge and attack with the nunchaku.

scenes.text: The shield absorbs the blast from the holy underwear, reflecting it back at the mummy lord. The mummy is momentarily stunned.

choices.text: Seize the moment and attack with the sword.
Try to grab the holy underwear.

scenes.text: Mir's nunchaku strikes land true, but the mummy lord's power is formidable. The battle rages on, each blow shaking the chamber.

choices.text: Continue attacking with the nunchaku.
Switch to the magical sword.

scenes.text: The magical sword glows with power as Mir strikes. The mummy lord is severely weakened, dropping the holy underwear.

choices.text: Pick up the holy underwear and use it.
Finish off the mummy lord with the sword.

scenes.text: Mir grabs the holy underwear, feeling its divine power course through. The mummy lord shrieks in anger and fear.

choices.text: Use the holy underwear to banish the mummy lord.
Destroy the holy underwear to weaken the mummy lord.

scenes.text: Mir's relentless nunchaku strikes finally overpower the mummy lord. The ancient foe collapses, defeated.

choices.text: Take the holy underwear as a trophy.
Search the chamber for other treasures.

scenes.text: Wielding the holy underwear, Mir channels its divine energy, unleashing a powerful blast that obliterates the mummy lord.

choices.text: Revel in victory and explore the chamber.

scenes.text: With a final, decisive strike, Mir ends the mummy lord's reign of terror. The chamber falls silent, victory achieved.

choices.text: Search the chamber for other treasures.

scenes.text: The holy underwear's power banishes the mummy lord to the void, ensuring it will never return.

choices.text: Revel in victory and explore the chamber.

scenes.text: Mir destroys the holy underwear, stripping the mummy lord of its power. In its weakened state, the mummy lord is easily defeated.

choices.text: Celebrate victory and search for treasures.

scenes.text: Mir takes the holy underwear as a trophy, feeling a sense of accomplishment. The chamber holds many secrets yet to be discovered.

choices.text: Explore the chamber for treasures.

scenes.text: Mir explores the chamber, finding ancient treasures and powerful artifacts. The journey through Mathkor has been perilous, but the rewards are immense.

choices.text: Return home with the treasures.

scenes.text: With the treasures of Mathkor in hand, Mir returns home, celebrated as a hero. The adventures in the lost city will be told for generations.

choices.text: The End.
